title: Who still has a 3D TV? - Quora

response.answer_text: I do. To me personally it’s a more interesting and enjoyable feature than UHD or HDR - though I do wish I’d been able to snag one of the 4K sets with 3D support before they stopped making them. I’ve got 48 Blu-ray 3D movies (and counting) and I more or less refuse to watch most of them flat. I can only see myself switching to a new TV either when this one dies or if they start making 3D sets again.
